root.name: Guild 02
root.description: The Starship DamreyALONEA closed-environment suspense game from Kazuya Asano and Takemaru Abiko, The Starship Damrey (Uchuusen Damrey-Gou) is developed around the concept of not needing any sort of prior knowledge or even a manual. The player character suffering from amnesia has to find out where they are, who they are and what is going on in that place.Bugs vs. TanksYes, that's an ant attacking a tiny tank Bugs vs. Tanks! (Mushikera Sensha) is a miniature tank game by Keiji Inafune and Comcept. A lost tank battalion that was presumed dead is shrunken down and must battle ants and other insects to survive.Attack of the Friday Monsters!Monsters Appear On FridayFrom director Kazu Ayabe comes Attack of the Friday Monsters! A Tokyo Tale (Kaijuu ga Deru Kinyoubi) in which he tries to recreate the nostalgic childhood love of giant monsters and battling heroes. The game is set in a parallel world of early 1960's Japan which gets invaded every Friday night by giant monsters. The story is told from the eyes of a 10 year old boy.Additional FeaturesGuild 02 will also feature password connectivity with Guild 01, allowing players to access special features that can only be unlocked if they own both games.
